description: Boris Johnson says former party treasurer Peter Cruddas has a "long track record" of political service.
title: Peter Cruddas: PM overrules watchdog with Tory donor peerage
title_page: Peter Cruddas: PM overrules watchdog with Tory donor peerage - BBC News
maintext: The Lord Speaker, Lord Fowler, criticised the number of new peers, which will bring the total membership of the House of Lords to more than 830, accusing Mr Johnson of a "massive U-turn" on his predecessor Theresa May's policy of reducing it in size.
